external_games.name: The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 4
The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 4

name: The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 4
summary: This is the fourth volume of The Idolmaster Gravure For You! series. It has a new compilation of songs: "TAKANE OrientalRedMIX". Interestingly, while the rest of the original mixes contain the idols' image color, Takane's image color (carmine) is replaced with "Oriental Red".
